class.name: wxHtmlWindow
class.description: wxHtmlWindow is probably the only class you will directly use unless you want to do something special (like adding new tag handlers or MIME filters).

flag.name: wxHW_SCROLLBAR_NEVER
flag.description: Never display scrollbars, not even when the page is larger than the window.

flag.name: wxHW_SCROLLBAR_AUTO
flag.description: Display scrollbars only if page's size exceeds window's size.

flag.name: wxHW_NO_SELECTION
flag.description: Don't allow the user to select text.

url.label: URL
url.description: Page to display in the window.

text.name: htmlcode
text.label: HTML code
text.description: HTML markup to display in the window.

event.name: wxHtmlCellEvent
event.description: This event class is used for the events generated by wxHtmlWindow.

type.name: wxEVT_COMMAND_HTML_CELL_HOVER
type.description: The mouse passed over a wxHtmlCell.

event.name: wxHtmlLinkEvent
event.description: This event class is used for the events generated by wxHtmlWindow.

type.name: wxEVT_COMMAND_HTML_LINK_CLICKED
type.description: A wxHtmlCell which contains an hyperlink was clicked.
